q: When will lenses for other mounts be released?
a: While other mounts are under consideration, currently we are only developing products for Micro Four Thirds and E-mount. You can follow us on twitter for future product announcements.

q: Where are SLR Magic lenses manufactured?
a: The HyperPrime lenses are manufactured in China and Japan. Lenses are calibrated and assembled in Hong Kong.

q: Does the lens support automatic focusing?
a: No, the lens is a fully manual design.

q: Does the lens cover the whole image sensor, and is there any vignetting?
a: Yes, the lens covers the entire image sensor, and does not produce any vignetting.
